en-US.summary: BEA Pumpkin Pi - Educational Audio Technology & Conversation Enhancement for Echo Dot
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Pumpkin Pi to teach me about audio
Alexa, tell Pumpkin Pi to explain beatboxing
Alexa, ask Pumpkin Pi about spatial audio concepts
en-US.name: BEA Pumpkin Pi
en-US.description: Educational Audio Technology Learning Platform for Amazon Echo Dot. Learn about spatial audio concepts, beatboxing techniques, sound engineering principles, and audio technology through interactive conversation. Enhanced with BEA emotional intelligence for personalized learning experiences. Transform your Echo Dot into an engaging audio education companion.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test the skill by saying 'Alexa, ask Pumpkin Pi to teach me about audio' or 'Alexa, tell Pumpkin Pi to explain frequency'
